free: #e At night, the moon came out.
#c 晚上月亮出來了。
#e It was specially good.
#c 這特別好。
#e Tonight the child put the frog he raises into this jug.
#c 今天晚上這小孩把他養的青蛙放在這甕裡。
#n habay 為小米，加上使動前綴pa-之後pahabay成為豢養。
#e That dog was very happy and wanted to make friends with that frog.
#c 那隻狗很高興想要和那隻青蛙做朋友。
#n 根據發音者tanu為前綴時語意為「很」。
#n namuh高興 ma-namuh喜歡
#n 根據發音者，kiza不好，使用tiza 或tya 較好
#e That child and dog were sleeping.
#c 那小孩和狗在睡覺。
#n a tya== wacu 為atu ya wacu 的縮寫
#e That frog wanted to come out and had fun.
#c 那隻青蛙想要出來玩。
#e That child and that dog woke up and did not see that frog.
#c 那小孩和那隻狗醒來沒有看到那隻青蛙。
#e They were shocked too and in a hurry rummaged around the house so as to find the frog.
#c 他們也嚇一跳，趕快翻家中的所有物品找那隻青蛙。
#e That dog put its head inside of the jug.
#c 那隻狗把頭放進甕裡面。
#n labu 裡面 ta-labu 進去
#e But (he) could not get rid of that jug.
#c 但（他）是不能拿掉那甕。
#e It became the dog’s hat.
#c 就變成狗的帽子了。
#e That child opened the door, yelled and searched for the frog.
#c 那小孩打開那門呼喊著青蛙找尋青蛙。
#n IU 26 中的eteb 意指關閉。而sa-eteb 指可關閉的東西，延伸成門
#n sacingalan 指窗戶
#n 發音者指出IU 28 可只說 tya balaut
#e But that dog fell off the door.
#c 但是那隻狗從門上跌下來。
#n 應是「但是那隻狗從窗上跌下來。」
#e That jug was broken.
#c 那甕破了。
#e That child was shocked, ran fast to there and held that dog in the arms.
#c 那小孩嚇一跳趕快跑去抱那隻狗。
#e If (it) gets hurt, it is so poor.
#c 如果（他）受傷了，他會很可憐。
#n anu...sa表示「如果...的話」。
#e Then they went out.
#c 然後就到外面。
#n 根據發音者 tu在這有然後的語意
#e They searchd for the frog around their house and in the bushes.
#c 在家的四周及樹叢中找青蛙。
#n kilakilang 為樹叢；這裡的tu表示主題標記。
#e They looked up and saw many bees.
#c 他們往上看到很多蜜蜂。
#e Originally there was a hive in the tree.
#c 原來在那個樹上有蜂巣。
#n 根據發音者E 為發音 [e]，因SAKIZAYA中無此音，故以大寫代替。
#n E== za i za 為這裡那裡
#e The dog wanted to crawl over there and took the hive.
#c 那隻狗想要爬過去摘蜂巣。
#n kayakay 在阿美語中指「橋」。
#e But that dog was shocked because it was stung by a bee.
#c 但那隻狗嚇一跳，因為被蜜蜂螫了。
#n KWA 有將的意思係為口語用法，可省略或用KU代替。
#e That child went there and looked at that hole.
#c 那孩子去那邊看那個洞。
#n IU57的SA作為主題標記。
#e He was surprised because that hole was a mouse hole.
#c 他很驚訝因為那個洞是老鼠洞。
#e He removed that beehive.
#c 摘那個蜂巢。
#e All of the bees were angry.
#c 蜜蜂全部都很生氣。
#e All of the bees stung that dog.
#c 全部的蜜蜂都要去螫那隻狗。
#e That dog kept running, fearing to be stung by the bees.
#c 那隻狗一直跑，很怕被蜜蜂螫。
#e That child saw a tree hole there.
#c 那小孩看到那邊有樹洞。
#e He climbed up and found that frog.
#c 他爬上去找那青蛙。
#e He saw an eagle and fell off the tree.
#c 他看到老鷹嚇一跳就跌下來。
#n ma-tulu’ 為阿美語，Sakizaya則為ma-debay。
#n na ca’ay pakayza 不從。
#e That child was crying.
#c 那小孩一直哭。
#n mu-angic表示哭；tanu 表示「非常」，如tanu-dihi「非常可憐」、 tanu-paisu「很多錢」、tanu-namuh「很喜歡」。
#e (He) climbed that rock.
#c （他）爬那顆大石頭。
#e He thought that was a tree.
#c 他原本以為是樹。
#e He grabbed but (it) moved.
#c 他一抓而（它）會動。
#e He saw it, which was a horn.
#c 他一看原來那是羊角。
#n melaw為阿美語。
#e That child was hung on a horn.
#c 那孩子掛在羊角上。
#n 根據發音者mi-ca’it有主動的意思，而ma-ca’it 有被動的意思。
#e That goat threw that child out.
#c 那山羊把孩子丟出去。
#e That goat kicked off that dog.
#c 那隻山羊把狗踢走。
#e They fell down the cliff.
#c 他們掉到懸崖下。
#e They fell into a pond.
#c 他們掉到池塘裡。
#e Luckily, there was no stone.
#c 幸好沒有石頭。
#e That dog and child were not hurt.
#c 那狗和孩子沒受傷。
#e They were listening over there.
#c 他們在那裡聽著。
#e They came to themselves.
#c 他們醒過來。
#n 前綴masa-有變成的語意
#e They heard the sound of this frog.
#c 他們聽到這青蛙的聲音。
#e They climbed up the driftwood.
#c 他們爬上漂流木。
#e They saw two frogs hiding behind the driftwood.
#c 他們看到有二隻青蛙躲在漂流木的後面。
#e That child was happy.
#c 那孩子很高興。
#e He talked to that frog, “You are here!”
#c 他跟青蛙說：「原來你在這裡喔！。」
#e Other frogs heard (it).
#c 其他青蛙聽到了。
#e All of the frogs came.
#c 全部的青蛙都來了。
#e Here were many frogs.
#c 在那裡就有很多青蛙。
#e That dog and that child were very happy.
#c 那狗跟那孩子很高興。
#e They caught their friends.
#c 他們抓了他們的朋友。
#n 他們的朋友在此指「青蛙」的朋友。
#e That frog was going home.
#c 那青蛙要回家。
#e Other frogs were happy and saw them off.
#c 其他青蛙很高興，慢慢目送他們。
#n haymaw hantu 意指再見，係為慣用語。
#e That child told other frogs, “Take care!”
#c 那小孩跟其他青蛙說 “保重身體！”。
#n sa-kapah-en 中的sa-表示「做」。
